prompt: Make a website for a institute that primarily focuces on coding, development and DSA.
refinedPrompt: Create a website for CodeTech Institute, an educational organization specializing in coding, software development, and data structures and algorithms (DSA). The website should have a modern, professional design and include the following sections: Home, About Us, Courses (coding, development, DSA), Faculty, Resources, and Contact. Implement a user-friendly navigation menu, a course enrollment form, and a blog featuring articles on coding, development, and DSA topics. Optimize the website for search engines and ensure it is responsive and accessible across various devices.
